description:
Yokoshima-sensei and the other student council members go to the beach together. Everyone forms a study group before the summer ends, and Shino talks on the phone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Frolicking in the Waves, All Wet / All-Purpose Wing / Summer Nights, Summer Mornings
Nami to no Tawamure Bichobicho Da ze / Bannou Wing / Natsu no Yoru Natsu no Asa
波との戯れ びちょびちょだぜ / 万能ウィング / 夏の夜 夏の朝
